text.ops: First, filter to all Gold medal records across nations and sum their counts, resulting in a total of 45 Gold medals.
text.ops2: Next, filter to all Silver or Bronze medal records across nations and sum their counts, which totals 79 for Silver and Bronze combined.
text.last: Finally, compare the total Gold medals (45) to the combined total of Silver and Bronze medals (79) to check if 45 is greater than 79, which is false.
